text: Samir Abdul-Ridha (born 1 July 1958) is a former Iraqi football goalkeeper who played for Iraq in the 1986 Asian Games. He played for the national team between 1981 and 1986. http://niiiis.com/players2.html ==References== Category:Iraqi footballers Category:Iraq international footballers Category:Living people Category:1958 births Category:Association football goalkeepers
title: Samir Abdul-Ridha
